ej,moorj102,M,hendt901,Call at 3B $George Wright rounded 3B on the throw home; Bill Bathe relayed to 3B but 3B umpire Ted Hendry ruled Wright safe diving back into the bag; Athletics manager Jackie Moore ejected by 3B umpire Ted Hendry

ej,corrp102,M,cousd901,Fight after HBP ej,newmj001,M,cousd901,Fight after HBP ej,stewd001,P,cousd901,Fight after HBP $Dave Stewart threw his first pitch high and tight to Julio Franco; HP umpire Derryl Cousins warned Stewart; Indians manager Pat Corrales complained that Stewart should have been ejected immediately per a directive from AL president Bobby Brown; while talking with Cousins, Corrales said something to Stewart and, when the latter yelled back, walked toward the mound and kicked Stewart; Stewart, who is a brown belt in karate, punched Corrales, who fell to the ground; both benches cleared and a brawl ensued; Joe Carter punched Dave Kingman and other battles raged; Corrales, Stewart and Athletics manager Jeff Newman ejceted by Cousins
$Kingman was the runner at 2nd and returned to his base when he thought the deep fly would be caught; Griffin thought it would drop, ran hard from 1st and was out for passing Kingman
